actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in San Luis Obispo County, Calif., as the "Lopez Canyon Wilderness", and to establish the Lopez Canyon Scenic Area.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in San Luis Obispo County, California, as the "Lopez Canyon Wilderness." Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to establish the Lopez Canyon Scenic Area, and to administer this Area.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in San Luis Obispo County, Calif., as the "Lopez Canyon Wilderness", and to establish the Lopez Canyon Scenic Area.
